review: I absolutely love my firestick!! I have the capability to view the apps downstairs but didn't have a way to view in my bedroom w/out using my tablet. There were times I wanted to stay upstairs esp during the cold weather bc it's warmer upstairs. The "stick" allows me to do just that. I can download so many apps w room to spare. Sooo worth the $39 and then some!!
